channel.title: Theiviing help
channel.description: I've tired searching in client files for, "You have failed to pickpocket the man." so I can change the GOLD rate given by man when you pickpocket them. I can't find it. I've tired client.java, player.java. Someone help?

item.title: Theiviing help
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Second number is the item amount.

Read full topic

item.title: Theiviing help
item.dc:creator: @demonlover14 demonlover14
item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]That’s just the void.
I thought you were looking on it.
But to change the NPCs, declare that void (if you don’t have it)
Then add these:

if(NPCID == 1){ robPerson("man", 995, 105, 29, 1); } if(NPCID == 9){ robPerson("guard", 995, 272, 48, 15); } if(NPCID == 23){ robPerson("knight", 995, 440, 102, 30); } if(NPCID == 21){ robPerson("hero", 995, 760, 120, 60); } if(NPCID == 66){ robPerson("gnome", 995, 1200, 150, 80); }

Explaining:
robPerson(“gnome”, 995, 1200, 150, 80);
“gnome” is the NPC name called from the robPerson void.
995 is the item ID.
1200 is the amount.
150 is the XP.
80 is the level required.[/quote]
This is found where.
Client.java I found it, but does not have the GP rates.

Read full topic

item.title: Theiviing help
item.dc:creator: @demonlover14 demonlover14
item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]if(playerLevel[17] < req){ sM("You need at least "+req+" thieving to thieve this "+NPCNAME+"."); return; } if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction < actionInterval) return; if(misc.random(3)==1){ sM("You fail to pickpocket the "+NPCNAME+".."); stillgfx(348, absY, absX); setAnimation(881); actionInterval = 5000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); return; } actionInterval = 5000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); addSkillXP(exp*playerLevel[17], 17); addItem(item, amount); setAnimation(881); sM("You pickpocket the "+NPCNAME+"."); }[/quote]
What is it to change the GOLD amount then.

Read full topic
